Phrase.Text: Thought you could sneak through this quadrant undetected eh, [YourLeaderName]? The [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] are not a bunch of fools.
Thought you could sneak through this quadrant undetected eh, [YourLeaderName]? The [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] are not a bunch of fools. You will pay for that assumption!

Thought you could sneak through this quadrant undetected eh, [YourLeaderName]? The [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] are not a bunch of fools. You will pay for that assumption! Nothing but death awaits you in this quadrant.
